Report.Name: MF-1995 Metric Book Format

DataSource.ConnectionString: Provider=SQLNCLI.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Persist Security Info=False;Initial Catalog=ccddev;Data Source=binnorsqld002\sql2k5

Report.OnOpen:
function formatdescription(book_desc,indent_code,format_char) on error resume next s = Trim(book_desc) if nz(format_char) > "0" then s = "\b " & left(s, format_char) & "\b0 " & mid(s, format_char + 1) end if if not isnull(indent_code) then i = clng(indent_code) s = space(i * 4) & s end if formatdescription = "{" & s & "}" end function
function reformatnumber(value, percent_flag) on error resume next v = 0 v = trim(value) if v = "" or v = "0" then s = "" elseif percent_flag = "Y" then v = cdbl(v) / 100 s = formatpercent(v, 1) else v = cdbl(v) f = 2 if v >= 100000 then f = 0 s = formatnumber(v, f, -1, 0, -1) end if reformatnumber = s end function
function nz(value) on error resume next if isnull(value) then nz = "" else nz = value end if end function
function fixunit(value) if instr(value, "2") > 0 then value = replace(value, "2", "²") end if if instr(value, "3") > 0 then value = replace(value, "3", "³") end if fixunit = value end function
function formatcrewqtyid(crew_qty, crew_id, crew_type_code) on error resume next
crewqty = 0 crewid = "" crewtypecode = ""
if not isnull(crew_qty) then crewqty = trim(crew_qty) end if
if not isnull(crew_id) then crewid = trim(crew_id) end if
if not isnull(crew_type_code) then crewtypecode = trim(crew_type_code) end if
if crewid = "" then s = "" else if crewtypecode = "C" then s = crewid else if crewtypecode = "L" then s = formatnumber(crewqty, 0, 0, 0, 0) & " " & crewid else s = "n/a" end if end if end if
formatcrewqtyid = s
end function

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnPrint: Line100.Visible = (txt_row_count mod 2 = 0) sTemp = Left(table_ref, 1) txtRefID.Text = sTemp txtRefID.Visible = (sTemp = "R") txtGraphicRef.Visible = (nz(Graphic_Ref) > " ")
